articles.author: Alex Gangitano
articles.title: Trump: Putin ‘tapping me along’ with Russia strikes on Ukraine - The Hill
articles.description: President Trump on Saturday said he thinks Russian President Vladimir Putin may be stringing him along after the latest deadly strikes on Ukraine, as the U.S. seeks to bring an end to the war in Eastern Europe. “There was no reason for Putin to be shooting mi…
